Name: Lover Bands
About the game: Lover Bands is a 2-player cooperative platform game where you are tied together by a bond of souls. Work together to collect gems, avoid enemies, and jump into the black hole before the timer runs out! Find a friend, drag them to your couch, grab a wireless keyboard, and start mashin' away! Don't hate each other too hard.
